mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_uuid = #{userUuid} AND is_deleted = false AND activated = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND is_deleted = false AND activated = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = false AND activated = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE is_deleted = false AND activated = true ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(email, password, password_hash, user_uuid, deleted_yn, role, created_at, modified_at) VALUES(#{user.email}, #{user.password}, #{user.passwordHash}, #{user.userUuid}, #{user.deletedYn}, CAST(#{user.role} AS TEXT), NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email = #{user.email}, password = #{user.password}, nickname = #{user.nickname}, activated = #{user.activated}, is_deleted = #{user.isDeleted}, role = CAST(#{user.role} AS TEXT), modified_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{user.userId}
UPDATE users SET is_deleted = true, modified_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
